reviewText: Watching the video makes the time riding my bicycle /trainer set up go by fast !  Better work out using it.

I mean the producers really captured that ethereal Southwestern magic here.  Yes, theres definitely a lot of road-cycling scenery, but what moved me (and Ive watched it at least three times already!) is the combination of the music, the BEAUTIFUL red rock landscapes and just the timing of it all- its like a dream- I highly recommend it!
